message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,000,000. This is a great price considering its value to you.  I'm confident we can reach an agreement that benefits both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950,000 for the product. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise between the product's value to me and its worth to you.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I value our potential partnership,  $950,000 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $975,000. This price recognizes the value you place on the product while allowing me to get closer to my desired outcome.

I understand your position, Alice. Thank you for adjusting your offer. I am willing to consider $960,000 for the product. I believe this price strikes a balance between the value I see in the product and what you're able to offer.
